logentry.author: ben
logentry.msg:
First stab at [SAM-1541] Allows * named user subscriptions to be included on an account request but without mentioning the named_user lookup. * manipulation of the named_user resource via REST.
Addition of * the table and sequence patches * SAMS::DB, SAMS::Resource, SAMS::Request::Server objects. * Custom relationship to describe an accounts 'named user subscriptions' * Explicit call to include these named subscriptions when annotating. * named_user to stop list to prevent body of account & subscription being included.

logentry.msg: POD for [SAM-1541]

logentry.author: ben
logentry.msg: [SAM-1541] and [SAM-1542] to_xml tests weren't running with manual "Build test" because Test::XML is now plinkrd so tests were skipped. However, when trying to plinkr sams_server, Test::XML becomes available and so the tests were running and breaking. Modified the two new tests to include SEMANTICO::Bootstrap so we get Test::XML and updated tests/data to run.
